original: @192b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @192b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya shr'i ma h'a k'a la n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
analyzed: a'arya shr'i ma h'a k'a la n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
translated: Ārya-śrī-mahākāla-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī of Śrī Mahākāla

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so //
translated: Not long after the Blessed One had attained perfect buddhahood and subdued Māra on the vajra seat, he was dwelling at the foot of the Bodhi tree.

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po ma h'a k'a la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po ma h'a k'a la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba /
translated: In the direction of the Blessed One, the great lord of the celestial hosts, the master of the wealth of Mahākāla, the lord of the desire realm,

original: dpal mgon po nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: dpal mgon po nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: the glorious Mahākāla, having bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One, sat to one side and made this request:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyi bzhes su gsol /🔽aom shr'i ma h'a k'a la g'a na gu ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyi bzhes su gsol / aom shr'i ma h'a k'a la g'a na gu ti sv'a h'a /
translated: I offer my awareness to you, please accept it.🔽Oṃ śrī mahākāla gāṇapati svāhā.

original: na ma: shr'i ma h'a k'a la g'a ne gu ti sh'a y'a /
analyzed: na ma: shr'i ma h'a k'a la g'a ne gu ti sh'a y'a /
translated: Homage to Śrī Mahākāla Gāṇapati.

original: na mo yo gi na ni na /
analyzed: na mo yo gi na ni na /
translated: Homage to the yoginīs.

original: tadya th'a / aom hi le hi le /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom hi le hi le /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ hile hile

original: ki te ki te ni /
analyzed: ki te ki te ni /
translated: kite kite ni

original: tsi de tsi de ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: tsi de tsi de ni sv'a h'a /
translated: cide cide ni svāhā.

original: nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa @193a *//🔽man chad bcing ngo //
analyzed: nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa @193a *// man chad bcing ngo //
translated: All illnesses, all fevers, all spirits, all misfortunes, all bhūtas, all evil thoughts, and all evil views are bound above up to the Paranirmita-vaśavartin heaven.

original: 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo //
analyzed: 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo //
translated: Below, they are bound down to the hells.

original: thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo //
analyzed: thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo //
translated: Horizontally, they are bound up to the surrounding mountains.

original: gzhan yang 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di bton pas gtsug lag khang dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma /
translated: Moreover, by reciting this, the protector of the monastery and maṇḍala,

original: dug gsum nad kyi sman pa /
analyzed: dug gsum nad kyi sman pa /
translated: the doctor for the illness of the three poisons,

original: rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing /
analyzed: rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing /
translated: The life-tree of all vidyādharas,

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla /
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla /
translated: The general of all yogins,

original: bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug /
analyzed: bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug /
translated: The lord of all demon tamers,

original: srin po langka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa /🔽gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa /
analyzed: srin po langka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa /
translated: Who utterly destroyed the city of the rākṣasa Laṅkā,🔽Who utterly destroyed the kumbhāṇḍa son of the asura Nam-mkha’i glog-ma-sprin,

original: lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa /
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa /
translated: Who utterly destroyed the asura son of the asura Nam-mkha’i glog-ma-snying,

original: dkon mchog gsum gyis bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyis bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o //
translated: Who promised to protect the teachings of the Three Jewels.

original: 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of the noble glorious Mahākāla is complete.
